body: Bruh... i just dont know my guys shes too much of a slut what a whore that bitch i just dont know ive seen too many ntr and this just makes me sick reading it i need a better one

The story would be much more palatable if all of the dudes aside from the cuck BF weren't a bunch of fat, ugly, nerds.  It's just so unrealistic that a couple of cute girls like that would be attracted to, or want to fuck such ugly, nerdy, douches.

@6P70 Hina is a closet exhibitionist and Jun is into Netorase. Each chapter is just Hina delving further into being a slut and everyone else in the student council wanting to have sex with her. The story is a comedy/ parody of other NTR tropes. The only real story/plot line is the mystery of Kawatari, which will be answered in the last chapter.
I'm so lost in that story, if anyone could enlighten me
